title: New: Alt-J – Buffalo (Feat. Mountain Man)
body: Taking a break from a rather arduous University assignment, and what should greet me other than a brand new song from Mercury Prize winners **Alt-J** featuring Bella Union’s **[Mountain Man](https://www.facebook.com/mountainmansquint?ref=ts&fref=ts)** taken from the official soundtrack of Silver Linings Playbook, a film that premiered at the Toronto film festival earlier in the year. Utilizing the stunning vocals found on their debut LP **_An Awesome Wave_**, it’s not much of a departure from the sound that earned them such esteemed plaudits, with the intricate relationship between each instrument directing the majority of _Buffalo_.
